report.name: lvl0_profiled_time
report.text: Application profile is too short (7.03 s)
report.desc:
If the overall application profiling time is less than 10 seconds, many of the measurements at function or loop level will very likely be under the measurement quality threshold (0,1 seconds).
 Rerun to increase runtime duration: for example use a larger dataset or include a repetition loop.

report.name: lvl0_optimization_level
report.text: Optimization level option is correctly used

report.name: lvl0_utilitary_options
report.text: Most of time spent in analyzed modules comes from functions compiled with -g
report.desc: -g option gives access to debugging informations, such are source locations. Add -fno-omit-frame-pointer to improve the accuracy of callchains found during the application profiling

report.name: lvl0_architecture_options
report.text: Compilation of some functions is not optimized for the target processor
report.desc: Architecture specific options are needed to produce efficient code for a specific processor ( -x(target) or -ax(target) ).

report.name: lvl0_profiled_modules
report.text: Application is correctly profiled ("Others" category represents 0.07 % of the execution time)
report.desc: To have a representative profiling, it is advised that the category "Others" represents less than 20% of the execution time in order to analyze as much as possible of the user code
